topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/553f0bd56368720c61b82700#post_553f0bd56368720c61b82700
It's not that I'm searching for approval from someone else.
It's just that I have no objective in mind when doing this as despite how much I want to do this and I love to do this, my mind keeps telling me that it is a waste of time and energy in doing so.
And so, motivation from myself isn't a really a good option unless I have an objective. Kinda like going to school or having a job.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976
